message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer but $14,000 is too high for me. I'm interested in the product but I can only go as high as $8,000.
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest.  While $14,000 represents fair value, I understand your position.  Could you do $11,000?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me. $11,000 is closer, but I still can't justify that price.  I'd be willing to meet you at $9,000.  That's the maximum I can offer.
